tweets.text: @SianieRoo @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK I've just vomited in the kitchen. I've had an increase in headaches, migraines, and sleep deprivation, but I've never vomited because of the odour before üòî What a way to start the work day üëç Positive news can't come soon enough.

Nothing to see here eh @EnvAgencyMids & @RedIndustries2? Just a damning letter describing how the toxic gases from Walley‚Äôs Quarry affect Staffordshire‚Äôs Fire and Rescue Service. I‚Äôd put that on the top of any risk registers you have (if you have any of course). #stopthestink https://t.co/avCr11feZn
Photo from today. Capping still unfinished. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Don't try to tell us they did it on time, we have eyes. https://t.co/6HwgiXw9hB

@sunnyraisin62 @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe There was drone footage last weekend of the site removing large amounts of plasterboard from the landfill that had recently been tipped ahead of the @EnvAgency visit so this one is a certainty. The inspection process should never allow this to happen...  @DefraGovUK @WHO

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

The failure of the @EnvAgency @
@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA to issue any communication re the landfill capping situation (deadline was last Friday) is utterly unforgivable given they are painfully aware that the community is at the end of its tether. @DefraGovUK #stopthestink

Thank you @MattHancock for supporting my campaign, and the people of #NewcastleUnderLyme, by writing to the @EnvAgency.

As Matt says, it is imperative that the Environment Agency exercise the full range of their regulatory and enforcement powers over the company. https://t.co/lH1na7Cr8A

tweets.text: @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe after browsing a fair number of these responses how can you @EnvAgencyMids /@EnvAgency  justify varying their permit given that a landfill with a history of odour complaints . https://t.co/Hb1BlVogdw https://t.co/uva3Efik8b

@NigelSarbutts @cynicalkind @GarethDennis @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I guess no-one triggered by the HS2 analogy is bothering to look at the clip, and firing off insults right left and centre, sigh.

@MrH_Wyberton @EnvAgency @BostonBarrierEA @WybertonPrimary I‚Äôm very excited to come and talk to Deer class all about this! It‚Äôs great you have been able to have civil engineers in the classroom! #EducatingChampions

Year 6 have had a brilliant workshop from @EnvAgency @BostonBarrierEA to aid our learning. Exploring the floods the local area faced and how to prevent them has been a great way to start our D.T this term - civil engineers here we come! #EducatingChampions @WybertonPrimary https://t.co/EgNv8Duj3V

@EmBeck2015 @NigelSarbutts @GarethDennis @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Dress it up as much as you like. Packham deliberately included the #hs2 hashtag simply because of his personal animosity. There was no correlation whatsoever
@StinkStopthe @EnvAgency  and @PHE_uk  are going to end up responsible for something serious soon.

@SimonTagg @JamesBevanEA @MattHancock @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA This place needs closing and capping, if it needs to become an orphan site so be it, If you had done your job correctly in the first place then there would be more than ¬£1 million set aside for the restoration phase. That's not our fault, it's yours.

urls.description: The chief executive and the marketing director of Atlantic Waste - a company bought by investment firm Augean in 2005 - have been jailed for hiring detectives to tap phones and hack into the computers of Environment Agency officers and council staff.
